> Just thought I'd let you all know about it, this might also explain 
some of
> the quirky behaviour (it does read and write the correct number of 
bytes,
> just doesn't store them all) that DPH was reporting.

I am working on fixing that problem.  I am also busy putting those 
scenario file scecifications into a system of HTML pages.  As soon as 
I am finished with that, I'll upload a zipped file containing those 
HTML pages into this website.  (I can't feature anyone nowadays 
getting a hold of Gladiator without a web browser on his/her computer 
.) Deathifier, I am probably going to email those files first to 
let you preview them for logical order.
